content.question: Which of the following is a parametrization of the implicitly defined function <math alttext="y equals x squared"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals square root of t"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi>t</mi></msqrt></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals t"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals t"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

<math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals t"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi></math>

<math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses equals t"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi></math> and <math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses equals t squared"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
